QuestData.Title: Mind the Hives
QuestData.Description:
The one called Edwin came to us not long ago, seeking to earn the blessings of the Wicker Man. He wandered off into the hills looking for his own offering.
Unfortunately, he managed to disturb one of the nearby beehives, causing the insects to become rather frenzied.
That was the last I saw of him, I'm afraid.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Edwin Maldus in Barbthorn Ridge.
QuestData.RewardText:
You were the one looking for Edwin, weren't you!?
You must help him!
